query:
INSERT INTO iot_alarms (device_id, alarm_code, alarm_type, message, value, threshold) 
SELECT id, 'VIB_HIGH', 'warning', 'Vibration level above threshold (2.8 > 2.5)', '2.80', '2.50' FROM iot_devices WHERE device_code = 'VIB-003'
UNION ALL
SELECT id, 'DEV_OFFLINE', 'critical', 'Device went offline', NULL, NULL FROM iot_devices WHERE device_code = 'PWR-004';
